title: ElAgu dayavaccurA
sahitya:
ElAgu dayavaccurA nApai nIku 


anupallavi

  nIlavarNa dEha nitya mangaLamUrtE pAlitAmara I patituni brOva


caraNam 1    manasu nIyandE nilipnavADai ninnenci pUja sEyalEdurA
dinamOkanimipamu nIpAda bhajananu dEvadEva svapnamandaina nEruga
    caraNam 2    bhAvaja janaka nIguNamulanevaraitE bAguga pADitE hitamugA vinavO rAma
pAvana nAma shabarivale nE phalamula nosagi paricaryanu salupalEdA
    caraNam 3    dAsa rakSakuDani birudu bUniyuNTE dayanunci kAcitE kAvumu rAma rAma
vAsavAdinuta sadAshivArcita vanaja sambhavatAta mauni sannuta
